Welcome to the orientation module for PSYC 3043! We will cover everything here and more on the first day of class. See you there.

## Goals

- Quick course orientation
- Show you how weekly modules will work
- Get you ready for Week 2!

## Instructions 

Work through each of the following Read, Annotate, and Reflect sections. The Read section will provide details on all the assigned material for Tuesday and Thursday each week. The Annotate section will contain instructions about annotation assignments as well as any slides/links that may be used during class. The Reflect section will provide instructions about the assignment(s) due at the end of the week - these may include the weekly assignments as well as any project-related milestones.

### Submit your summary (QALMRI/SPARK)
In a regular week, you will select any ONE article/podcast from the assigned material and submit the corresponding QALMRI (for empirical articles) or SPARK (for reviews or podcasts). All submissions should have the following format:

- Article Title:
- Article APA citation: 
- Format: QALMRI / SPARK
- Summary (following the QALMRI/SPARK framework)
